EmailTemplate.name: 201711_Global_Email_B737NG_ASM_mih.201711_Global_Email_B737NG_ASM_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell B737NG ASM Insulation Blanket Available for Purchase
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Are you having issues with torn, fluid-soaked insulation blankets that cannot be reused when the ASM module on your 737s are replaced? What about misplaced or broken brackets? Honeywell has a solution.
Replacement blankets and brackets are now available by the piece, and as many as you need. Replacing your future ASMs is clean, easy and saves time and money!
CLICK HERE FOR MORE INFO <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/B737NG_ASM_Blanket_Brochure_final-final_Nov 7-2017.pdf]]>
For online ordering, please visit myaerospace.honeywell.com <[[https://myaerospace2.honeywell.com/onlineordering/ordering/OOPriceAvaildplnk?partNumber=5850412-1]]>.
Honeywell Aerospace
